exceptions.tactic: intros f u l Hcont Hin.
intros f' u l Hcont Hin.
intros f' u' l Hcont Hin.
intros f' u' l' Hcont Hin.

original: intros f u l Hcont Hin. unfold is_lim_seq. intros epsilon Heps. destruct (Hcont l Heps) as [delta Hdelta]. destruct (Hin (Rbar_locally l) Hdelta) as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. apply Heps. apply Hdelta. apply HN. apply Hn.
